title: Pride and Premiership
description: Welcome to the hilarious diary of Remy Louise Bennet, aged 17 (and a half), wannabe WAG and aspiring businesswomanRemy is a girl with goals. This week it’s to marry a footballer – and as every aspiring WAG knows, there are rules…The WAG Charter1. At first, pretend you don’t know he’s a footballer.2. Don’t let him see you drunk, or he won’t trust you when he’s away on a pre-season tour.3. Never dispute a thing his mum says (they worship their mums).
author: Michelle Gayle
